title: Building Constructs II - Ligation to Propagation

cells.data:
# Building Constucts II

[x] clone melanogaster
[x] clone rufa
[ ] clone jambulina

Was unable to get colonies, except a few.  
[x] Test these with PCR:
[ ] Try with differnt bacterial transformation
[ ] ligate again

[ ] ligate melanogaster 
[ ] ligate rufa
[ ] ligate jambulina
[ ] Colonies and LB melanogaster
[ ] Colonies and LB rufa
[ ] Colonies and LB jambulina

---
[x] Colonies, LB, PCR test birchii
[x] Colonies, LB, PCR test bocki

[ ] Clean / high yield birchii
[ ] Clean / high yield bocki

[ ] Clean / high yield melanogaster
[ ] Clean / high yield rufa
[ ] Clean / high yield jambulina
[ ] Sequence verify and verify birchii 
[ ] Sequence verify and verify bocki
[ ] Sequence verify and verify melanogaster
[ ] Sequence verify and verify rufa
[ ] Sequence verify and verify jambulina


## Testing the clean up

One thing I am testing is if I can not ever gel purify. It is a bitch. I did half the clean up from the digestion of PCR CM012 with gel purify and regular zymo clean- up.  

1. PCR CM012 melanogster & rufa 5-8 clean regular
2. PCR CM012 melanogster & rufa 1-4 clean gel

## DNA concentrations

1. D. jambulina = 332 ng/ul | 1:10 dilution = 33.2
2. D. melanogaster 1 = 591 ng/ul | 1:10 dilution = 59.1
3. D. melanogaster 2 = 14.7 ng/ul 
4. D. rufa 1 = 625 ng/ul | 1:10 dilution = 62.5
5. D. rufa 2 = 61.8 ng/ul


## Ligation

D. jambulina
3:1        | 100ng vector (.5ul 212ng/ul sample) | 19.01ng insert (.75ul 33 ng/ul)
7:1        | 100ng vector (.5ul 212ng/ul sample) | 44.92ng insert (1.5ul  33 ng/ul)
14:1 (ish) | 100ng vector (.5ul 212ng/ul sample) | 90ng insert (3ul  33 ng/ul)

D. melanogaster 1
3:1        | 100ng vector (.5ul 212ng/ul sample) | 19.01ng insert (.3ul 59.1 ng/ul)
7:1        | 100ng vector (.5ul 212ng/ul sample) | 44.92ng insert (.9ul  59.1 ng/ul)
14:1 (ish) | 100ng vector (.5ul 212ng/ul sample) | 90ng insert (1.8ul  59.1 ng/ul)

D. melanogaster 2
3:1        | 100ng vector (.5ul 212ng/ul sample) | 19.01ng insert (1.2ul 14.7 ng/ul)
7:1        | 100ng vector (.5ul 212ng/ul sample) | 44.92ng insert (3ul  14.7 ng/ul)
14:1 (ish) | 100ng vector (.5ul 212ng/ul sample) | 90ng insert (6ul  14.7 ng/ul)

D. rufa 1
3:1        | 100ng vector (.5ul 212ng/ul sample) | 19.01ng insert (.3ul 62.5 ng/ul)
7:1        | 100ng vector (1.5ul 73.2ng/ul sample) | 44.92ng insert (.9ul  62.5 ng/ul)
14:1 (ish) | 100ng vector (1.5ul 273.2ng/ul sample) | 90ng insert (1.8ul  62.5 ng/ul)

D. rufa 2
3:1        | 100ng vector (1.5ul 73.3ng/ul sample) | 19.01ng insert (.3ul 61.6 ng/ul)
7:1        | 100ng vector (1.5ul 73.2ng/ul sample) | 44.92ng insert (.9ul  61.8 ng/ul)
14:1 (ish) | 100ng vector (1.5ul 73.2ng/ul sample) | 90ng insert (1.8ul  61.8 ng/ul)

The ligations did not seem to work as all 12 plates only yielded 6 colonies.  I tested all six colonies for presence of insert in construct and all six colnies appeared to have presence.  See [PCR CM013_b](quiver-note-url/054EE1F4-F8B9-4B8F-B5AC-A62655B45F81).  So I went ahead and cleaned up with the birchii and bocki. 

## Cleanup

I cleaned 50 mL LB broth with the Qiagen MIDI kits.  Although the concentrations was almost zero (which is I think another problem having to do with measuring concentration) the gel showed that there is DNA.  Although as you can see from the gel the D. jambulina, D. melanogaster, and D. rufa are super fucked up. 

![Screen Shot 2016-09-21 at 12.08.26 PM.png](quiver-image-url/5633F6041C6B12D658C1467828069905.png)

## Presence

This is super weird though since I tested both the LB media direct and the cleaned product using the confirmation primers and they did all show prescence. See [PCR CM014](quiver-note-url/77644E10-0CE0-4002-ADD7-495E3A6A5D7B)![Screen Shot 2016-09-21 at 12.32.36 PM.png](quiver-image-url/8C7981E5BD67ED34E183559B8CAF5D6C.png)

## Quibit Concentrations

1. D. birchii = 81 ng/ul
2. D. bocki = 43 ng /ul
3. D. jambulina = 110 ng/ ul
4. D. melanogaster = 110 ng / ul
5. D. rufi = 52.7 ng ul

## D. bocki and D. birchii Confirmation 

### Digestion 

Enzyme Digestion and Gel: There are smears, but I think that is okay.  I am going to do an enzyme digestion using Bam and NotI. 

**birchii and jambulina **

|reagent|ul   | 
|------|------|
|buffer| 1    |
| NotI | .25  |
| Bam  | .25  |
| water| 7    |
| DNA  | 1    |

**bocki**

|reagent|ul   | 
|------|------|
|buffer| 1    |
| NotI | .25  |
| Bam  | .25  |
| water| 6    |
| DNA  | 2    |

2. Sequence:
